net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.sqlitehouse.annotations

Annotation Type SQLiteDatabaseSpec


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface SQLiteDatabaseSpec
    Annotates a class that defines a SQLite database. This should be applied only to classes that extend SQLiteHouse.
    Since:
    zerobandwidth-net/android 0.1.4 (#26)

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String database_name
      Specifies the name of the database file, as usually supplied to the constructor of SQLiteOpenHelper or SQLitePortal.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.Class<? extends SQLightable>[] classes
      A list of classes that constitute the data set being stored in the database.
      int schema_version
      The current schema version for the database overall, as usually supplied to the constructor of an SQLiteOpenHelper or SQLitePortal.

    • Element Detail

      • database_name

        public abstract java.lang.String database_name
        Specifies the name of the database file, as usually supplied to the constructor of SQLiteOpenHelper or SQLitePortal.
        Returns:
        the database name

      • schema_version

        public abstract int schema_version
        The current schema version for the database overall, as usually supplied to the constructor of an SQLiteOpenHelper or SQLitePortal.
        Returns:
        the current database schema version
        Default:
        1

      • classes

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends SQLightable>[] classes
        A list of classes that constitute the data set being stored in the database. Each of these classes must be decorated with an SQLiteTable annotation and must be capable of containing a row of that table.
        Returns:
        the list of classes that represent tables of the database
        Default:
        {}
